name: Kill Bobby Kotick/杀死 Bobby Kotick
description:
The purpose of this project is to raise funds, hire a killer to assassinate Bobby Kotick, who destroyed World of Warcraft in China.
We hope that every Chinese WoW player will donate $10 (75yuan) to support us.
Person who has killed Bobby Kotick will get the private key of donated wallet.
The deadline of this project is 01.23.2023.
该项目的目的是筹集资金，聘请杀手刺杀在中国毁了魔兽世界的鲍比·科蒂克。
我们希望每一位中国魔兽玩家都捐出10美元（75元）来支持我们。
杀死 Bobby Kotick 的人将获得捐赠钱包的私钥。
该项目的截至日期是2023年1月23日。
